typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ts as string,
		userId as string,
		sessionId as string,
		page as string,
		auth as string,
		method as string,
		status as string,
		level as string,
		itemInSession as string,
		location as string,
		lastName as string,
		firstName as string,
		registration as string,
		gender as string,
		artist as string,
		song as string,
		length as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> myAIM4Source
myAIM4Source select(mapColumn(
		{time stamp} = ts,
		page,
		method,
		status,
		level_type = level,
		location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(gender,
		level_type),
	CntSubtypeByGender = count(),
		{time stamp} = first({time stamp})) ~> CntSubtypeByGender
Select1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OriginalData
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(location),
	SubsByLocation = count(),
		{time stamp} = first({time stamp})) ~> SubsByLocation
OriginalData, CntSubtypeByGender join(OriginalData@{time stamp} == CntSubtypeByGender@{time stamp},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, SubsByLocation join(OriginalData@{time stamp} == SubsByLocation@{time stamp},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		{time stamp} = OriginalData@{time stamp},
		page,
		method,
		status,
		level_type = OriginalData@level_type,
		location = OriginalData@location,
		lastName,
		firstName,
		registration,
		gender = OriginalData@gender,
		gender = CntSubtypeByGender@gender,
		level_type = CntSubtypeByGender@level_type,
		CntSubtypeByGender,
		{time stamp} = CntSubtypeByGender@{time stamp},
		location = SubsByLocation@location,
		SubsByLocation,
		{time stamp} = SubsByLocation@{time stamp}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
